title: @Reav3 can certainlyT make the fiddel rework ?
body: I really loved the warwick and akali level design and despite a lot of people criticizism about him i really love the way he give each champion a unique kit in his design so is just a wish from a Fiddel main dunno if you already started his rework but i would like to see him get reworked from the true damage dealer thank you :)

A designers job is to design things that are fun to play. 
It is managements job to manage those designs so that they are fun to play against. 
It is the balance teams job to keep those designs in line and make sure that things arent to strong in practice. 

CT does his job, and he does it well. Hes just the scapegoat. 
Management doesnt take responsibility or accountability. 
The balance team doesnt even try.
WW is good, akali not so much
You keep _him_ away from my Fiddle.
